item.title: AQUA
item.dc:creator: l4c
item.description: AQUA is a suite of programs for Analyzing the QUAlity of biomolecular structures that were determined via NMR spectroscopy. AQUA is capable of calculating NOE violations, the level of completeness of NOEs based on the structure.

item.title: AutoAssign
item.dc:creator: l4c
item.description: AutoAssign is a constraint-based expert system for automating the analysis of backbone resonance assignments using NMR spectra of small proteins.

item.title: CNS
item.dc:creator: l4c
item.description: CNS (Crystallography & NMR System) is a software suite designed to provide a flexible multi-level hierachical approach for the most commonly used algorithms in macromolecular structure determination.

item.title: FIRM
item.dc:creator: l4c
item.description: FIRM (Full Iterative Relaxation Matrix) a flexible program for calculating NOEs and back-calculated distance constraints using the full relaxation matrix approach.

item.title: GAMMA
item.dc:creator: l4c
item.description: GAMMA is a C++ library written for simulation of Magnetic Resonance experiments. Its purpose is to provide a simple and intuitive means with which users may construct simulation programs to suit their individual needs. A Python wrapper is also available.

item.title: KryoMol
item.dc:creator: l4c
item.description: KryoMol is a KDE-based program for visualisation and analysis of several chemistry related file types such as quantum chemistry log files (Gaussian, NWChem, ACESII, GAMESS), molecular mechanics log files (Tinker, Macromodel), 1-D NMR spectra and JCAMP-DX spectra.

item.title: LSD Software
item.dc:creator: l4c
item.description: The goal of LSD (Logic for Structure Determination) is to help the user propose one or more molecular structures from data that is mainly extracted from 2D NMR spectra.

item.title: MEXICO
item.dc:creator: l4c
item.description: MEXICO simulates the NMR lineshapes of coupled spin systems undergoing chemical exchange. It will simulate systems and, if experimental data are available, it will perform an iterative fit to give optimized values of the parameters.

item.title: Mnova Suite
item.dc:creator: l4c
item.description: Mnova Suite is a GUI with plugins for processing and reporting NMR data, predicting NMR data and processing MS data. Individual plugins are available separately.

item.title: ModelFree
item.dc:creator: l4c
item.description: ModelFree is a program for optimizing Lipari-Szabo model free parameters to heteronuclear NMR spin relaxation data.
